com.ece.superkids.questions

Class FileQuestionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ece.superkids.questions.FileQuestionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuestionManager

    public class FileQuestionManager
extends Object
implements QuestionManager
    The FileQuestionManager manages custom questions stored on the local filesystem. The questions are stored in JSON format on in the user's home directory.
    Author:
    Ben Duong
